default.plastic: Check the number inside the recycling triangle. Clean plastics like bottles are generally recyclable.
default.paper: Clean paper is recyclable. Food-soiled paper is not.
default.metal: Recyclable if clean. Remove food residues.

San Francisco.plastic: All rigid plastics are recyclable curbside.
San Francisco.trash: Soft plastics go in the black bin.

New York.plastic: Only plastics labeled 1, 2, or 5 are recyclable.
New York.metal: Metal cans and foil are accepted after rinsing.
New York.glass: Glass bottles and jars only. No mirrors or windows.
